column4: How do I deactivate init scripts? Just because I installed wesnoth-server doesn't mean I want it to start every boot. :P
: You can 'chmod u-x' the script to make it not executable. I believe that will prevent it from running at boot
: Well, ideally I think the service should ask you whether you'd like it to start or not. If it listed itself under System > Administration > Services you can disable it there.
